column4: is it possible to install ubuntu on my 12" powerbook without messing with my os x install?
is posible, as posible as installing any debian with osx

Hostname: wildness - OS: Linux 2.6.8-powerpc/ppc - CPU: IBM PowerPC G3 750FX (900MHz) - Processes: 121 - Uptime: 2h 33m - Load Average: 0.77 - Memory Usage: 206.06MB/376.73MB (54.70%) - Disk Usage: 30.88GB/36.98GB (83.50%)
I haven't attempted anything but OS X on my powerbook.  I wanted to check out ubuntu, because I'm thinking of using it on my home fileserver.
